title: Primary Islet
description: A biosample that is directly harvested from a donor as islet cells.

rrid.title: RRID
rrid.comment: optional bc all sources do not have biosample RRIDs, but would be nice to require

pmi.title: Post-mortem Interval (hours)
pmi.description: The amount of time elapsed since death.
pmi.comment: Post-mortem interval should be reported, if known.

ccf_id.title: Common Coordinate Framework Identifier
ccf_id.description: HubMap Common Coordinate Framework unique identifier corresponding to the organ, biological structure, and spatial location of the tissue specimen.
ccf_id.comment: This identifier will be later linked to: https://portal.hubmapconsortium.org/ccf-eui

preservation_method.title: Preservation Method
preservation_method.description: The method by which the tissue was preserved: cryopreservation (slow-freeze) or flash-freezing.
preservation_method.comment: Indicate the tissue preservation_method if known and may be/become an experimental variable to track.

isolation_center.title: Isolation Center
isolation_center.description: Facility or location where the pancreas was isolated
enum: Network for Pancreatic Organ Donors with Diabetes(nPOD)
Islet Isolation Core at the University of Alberta (Edmonton)
ECIT Islet for Basic Research Program
Miami - University of Miami Sylvester Comprehensive Cancer Center

submissionExample.appscript: Network for Pancreatic Organ Donors with Diabetes(nPOD)
submissionExample.igvf_utils: Network for Pancreatic Organ Donors with Diabetes(nPOD)

cold_ischaemia_time.title: Cold Ischaemia Time (hours)
cold_ischaemia_time.description: Duration in hours that the pancreas was kept at a low temperature after removal from the donor, before the transplant or further processing

organ_source.title: Organ Source
organ_source.description: Type of donor from which the pancreas was obtained.

prep_viability.title: Prep Viability (percentage)
prep_viability.description: Percentage of viable cells in the pancreas preparation

warm_ischaemia_duration.title: Warm Ischaemia Duration / Down Time (hours)
warm_ischaemia_duration.description: Duration in hours that the pancreas was without blood supply at body temperature before being cooled or transplanted

purity.title: Purity (Percentage)
purity.description: Percentage of the pancreas preparation that consists of the target cells or tissue type

hand_picked.title: Hand Picked
hand_picked.description: Whether the pancreas or its components were manually selected or processed

pre_shipment_culture_time.title: Pre-Shipment Culture Time (hours)
pre_shipment_culture_time.description: Number of hours the pancreas or isolated islets were cultured before being shipped

islet_function_available.title: Islet Function Available
islet_function_available.description: Whether functional assays or data are available for the isolated pancreatic islets

digest_time.title: Digest Time (hours)
digest_time.description: Time taken to enzymatically digest the pancreas tissue during the isolation process

percentage_trapped.title: Percentage Trapped (percentage)
percentage_trapped.description: percentage of islets that are trapped or non-functional after the isolation process

islet_yield.title: Islet Yield (IEQ)
islet_yield.description: total number of Islet Equivalents (IEQ) obtained from the pancreas

pancreas_weight.title: IEQ/Pancreas Weight (grams)
pancreas_weight.description: ratio of Islet Equivalents to the weight of the pancreas in grams

post_shipment_islet_viability.title: Post-Shipment islet viability (%)
post_shipment_islet_viability.description: percentage of viable islet cells remaining after the islets have been shipped

facs_purification.title: FACS Purification
facs_purification.description: Links to the protocol(s) for conducting the assay on Protocols.io.

islet_morphology.title: Islet Morphology
islet_morphology.description: Indicates whether the morphology of the islets has been assessed

islet_histology.title: Islet Histology
islet_histology.description: Indicates whether the histology of the islets has been assessed
